ga
Class GeneticAlgorithm

java.lang.Object
  ga.GeneticAlgorithm

public class GeneticAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object

The top level GA class, used by other interested classes to interact with the GA. The main GA algorithm is defined in newEpoch()

Author:
Matt Oates

Constructor Detail

GeneticAlgorithm

public GeneticAlgorithm()
Create a GA with good default parameters and genetic operators. Other constructors used with user dialogue for tayloring the GA.

GeneticAlgorithm

public GeneticAlgorithm(Selection select,
                        Crossover cross)
Construct a GA with known selection and crossover operators.

Parameters:
select - The selection method to be used.
cross - The crossover method to be used.
See Also:
GeneticAlgorithmFactory, ga.selection, ga.crossover

GeneticAlgorithm

public GeneticAlgorithm(Selection select,
                        Crossover cross,
                        Symbiosis symb)
Construct a GA with all operators defined.

Parameters:
select - The selection method to be used.
cross - The crossover method to be used.
symb - The symbiosis method to be used.
See Also:
GeneticAlgorithmFactory, ga.selection, ga.crossover, ga.symbiosis
Method Detail

initPopulation

public void initPopulation(EntityManager manager)
Initialise the GA with a new random Agent population.

expressPopulation

public void expressPopulation()
Express the phenotype of all chromosomes in the GA on to their parent Agents.

newEpoch

public void newEpoch()
Generate a new GA epoch based on the current state of the game agents. This is the point at which all of the genetic operators are called.

random

public static double random()
Return a randomized number when not doing a DATA_RUN, otherwise return a predictabel set.

Returns:
A double between 0 and 1.
